attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TO SCRAP THE £50 FINE THAT PARENTS ARE BEING CHARGED, WHILE TAKING THEIR CHILDREN ON HOLIDAY OUTSIDE TERMS TIMES, ON THE GROUND THAT THIS IS HTTING YOUNG FAMILYS, THAT CAN NOT AFFORD TO GO AT MORE COSTLY TIMES IN TERM TIMES, AND ALSO UNABLE TO GO AT THESE TIMES DUE TO THEIR JOBS

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
